alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 26 at 1:37AM MST until November 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Little Belt and Highwood Mountains and Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 AM Sunday to 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains
